Articles.Content:
After starting on a modular base system based off of Temstars Modular Bases I realized that it would be very tiresome for Kerbals in their clunky spacesuits to climb up and down ladders every time that the wanted to do an EVA. Due to this problem I proudly present to you the first product from Dodgey Rockets Industries.

The Lazy Mans Ladder.....A ramp..Its a ramp..

Javascript is disabled. View full album

So basically it consists of five different parts. Four ramp segments and the base.

The base is made up of a Stayputnik, RTGs and batteries for power, four landing legs for stability (looks), rover wheels and other misc do dads. Now for the interesting part, the ramp. The ramp is made up of four separate segments each being able to "fold" through 180 degrees with the two end segments including expendable segments. It is just in the process of final refinement which will include adding lights, description, and various other visual refinements, this is mostly for the feedback to help me refine the idea and design.

Have fun and any and all feedback, both good and bad, is welcome.

Craft file:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/6wyh4577mqm6z9x/Ramp.craft

Edit: full mood list coming soon.
